verses.verse: And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> unto all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, I am an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>; I can <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no more go out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> and come in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: also the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me, Thou shalt not go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> this Yarden <S%H3383><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, he will go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, and he will destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8686><s%> these nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee, and thou shalt possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them: and Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, he shall go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, as the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them as he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Sichon <S%H5511><s%> and to Og <S%H5747><s%>, kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and unto the land <S%H776><s%> of them, whom he destroyed <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall give them up <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before your face <S%H6440><s%>, that ye may do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them according unto all the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> which I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> you.

Be strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and of a good courage <S%H553><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not, nor be afraid <S%H6206><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of them <S%H6440><s%>: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, he it is that doth go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with thee; he will not fail <S%H7503><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee, nor forsake <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, Be strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and of a good courage <S%H553><s%> <S%H8798><s%>: for thou must go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with this people <S%H5971><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them; and thou shalt cause them to inherit <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%>, he it is that doth go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee; he will be with thee, he will not fail <S%H7503><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee, neither forsake <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee: fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not, neither be dismayed <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> this Torah <S%H8451><s%>, and delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it unto the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, which bare <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and unto all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, At the end <S%H7093><s%> of every seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, in the solemnity <S%H4150><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%> of release <S%H8059><s%>, in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%>,

When all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to appear <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8736><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which he shall choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, thou shalt read <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> this Torah <S%H8451><s%> before all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in their hearing <S%H241><s%>.

Gater <S%H6950><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> together <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, men <S%H582><s%>, and women <S%H802><s%>, and children <S%H2945><s%>, and thy stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, that they may hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and that they may learn <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this Torah <S%H8451><s%>:

And that their children <S%H1121><s%>, which have not known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> any thing, may hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and learn <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, as long as <S%H3117><s%> ye live <S%H2416><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> whither ye go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, Behold, thy days <S%H3117><s%> approach <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that thou must die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8798><s%> Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, and present <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8690><s%> yourselves in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, that I may give him a charge <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%>. And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and presented <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8691><s%> themselves in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of a cloud <S%H6051><s%>: and the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, Behold, thou shalt sleep <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with thy fathers <S%H1><s%>; and this people <S%H5971><s%> will rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and go a whoring <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8804><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the 'elohim <S%H430><s%> of the strangers <S%H5236><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, whither they go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to be among <S%H7130><s%> them, and will forsake <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me, and break <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I have made <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with them.

Then my anger <S%H639><s%> shall be kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against them in that day <S%H3117><s%>, and I will forsake <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, and I will hide <S%H5641><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> from them, and they shall be devoured <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and many <S%H7227><s%> evils <S%H7451><s%> and troubles <S%H6869><s%> shall befall <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them; so that they will say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>, Are not these evils <S%H7451><s%> come <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon us, because our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is not among <S%H7130><s%> us?

And I will surely <S%H5641><s%> <S%H8687><s%> hide <S%H5641><s%> <S%H8686><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> for all the evils <S%H7451><s%> which they shall have wrought <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, in that <S%H3588><s%> they are turned <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Now therefore write <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye this song <S%H7892><s%> for you, and teach <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8761><s%> it the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8798><s%> it in their mouths <S%H6310><s%>, that this song <S%H7892><s%> may be a witness <S%H5707><s%> for me against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

For when I shall have brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them into the land <S%H127><s%> which I sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>, that floweth <S%H2100><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>; and they shall have eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and filled <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8804><s%> themselves, and waxen fat <S%H1878><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; then will they turn <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, and provoke <S%H5006><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me, and break <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

And it shall come to pass, when many <S%H7227><s%> evils <S%H7451><s%> and troubles <S%H6869><s%> are befallen <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, that this song <S%H7892><s%> shall testify <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against <S%H6440><s%> them as a witness <S%H5707><s%>; for it shall not be forgotten <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8735><s%> out of the mouths <S%H6310><s%> of their seed <S%H2233><s%>: for I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their imagination <S%H3336><s%> which they go about <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, even now <S%H3117><s%>, before I have brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> which I sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> therefore wrote <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> this song <S%H7892><s%> the same day <S%H3117><s%>, and taught <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And he gave Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> a charge <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Be strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and of a good courage <S%H553><s%> <S%H8798><s%>: for thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which I sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto them: and I will be with thee.

And it came to pass, when Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> had made an end <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8763><s%> of writing <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this Torah <S%H8451><s%> in a book <S%H5612><s%>, until they were finished <S%H8552><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

That Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>, which bare <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8800><s%> this book <S%H5612><s%> of the Torah <S%H8451><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it in the side <S%H6654><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, that it may be there for a witness <S%H5707><s%> against thee.

For I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy rebellion <S%H4805><s%>, and thy stiff <S%H7186><s%> neck <S%H6203><s%>: behold, while I am yet alive <S%H2416><s%> with you this day <S%H3117><s%>, ye have been rebellious <S%H4784><s%> <S%H8688><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and how much more after <S%H310><s%> my death <S%H4194><s%> ?

Gater <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto me all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, and your officers <S%H7860><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, that I may speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> in their ears <S%H241><s%>, and call <S%H5749><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> to record <S%H5749><s%> <S%H8686><s%> against them.

For I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that after <S%H310><s%> my death <S%H4194><s%> ye will utterly <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8687><s%> corrupt <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8686><s%> yourselves, and turn aside <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%> which I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> you; and evil <S%H7451><s%> will befall <S%H7122><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; because ye will do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, to provoke him to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8687><s%> through the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hands <S%H3027><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of all the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this song <S%H7892><s%>, until they were ended <S%H8552><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.
